name: Nuts 'n' Bolts
description:
Use WASD and the mouse buttons to control, read the "How to" for gameplay help.

USE BLACK HAMMER TO GET AI TO FOLLOW YOU, THEN HIT ENEMY WITH HAMMER TO GET AI TO ATTACK ENEMY

READ "how to" ON MENE FOR MORE HELP

Click to shoot hammer, use numbers/scroll wheel to select hammer, spawners are far apart, beat them all to move on to the next wave

Made for the Wowie game jam 4.0 "Collaborate with AI" 

Checkout my YouTube! dev log on this game coming soon https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDEsOunTTHlmoUaqZZhTH1Q
